Located in Arboletes Antioquia, nearby our municipality paradisiac beaches…

Riviera del Sol, Hotel SPA, hotel par excellence of "corazón caribe antioqueño", has the pleassure to provide the best accommodation and entertainment services in Caribbean Region of Antioquia province, strategically located at municipality entrance in front of sea, offering the best assistance and facilities.
Riviera del Sol, Hotel SPA, hotel par excellence of "corazón caribe antioqueño"…

Located in front of sea in Arboletes Antioquia municipality, 5 minutes away from downtown and 15 minutes away from mud volcano. It counts with green areas ideally for CAMPING, pools, toilets, 2 kiosks to host events, kitchen, bbq, parking lots, hammocks. The perfect place to get a pleasant rest.
Located in front of sea in Arboletes Antioquia municipality…

Enjoy in our restaurant the most delicious sea dishes, typical food from the region and all the country, desserts and more, recommended by our chefs. Our bar offers the most exquisite cocktails, drinks and imported and national liquors.
Enjoy in our restaurant the most delicious sea dishes…
Excellent restaurant located in the municipality downtown. We offer a vast variety of fast food at great prices.
We offer a vast variety of fast food at great prices…
Restaurant with affordable prices, located near the beach. In Nautilus you will find typical dishes of the caribbean region and executives dishes.
Restaurant with affordable prices, located near the beach…

El Volcán de Lodo de Arboletes ubicado en la cabecera municipal es el más grande de su especie en Latinoamérica. Con propiedades medicinales el volcán de lodo es uno de los mayores atractivos turísticos no solo de Arboletes sino de la región. Maravillosa expresión de la naturaleza.
Biggest mud volcano in Latin America…

Encontramos una gruta que es un adorno de piedra utilizado en la antigua Jerusalén para colocar imágenes religiosas, igualmente encontramos una pila bautismal también conocida como bautisterio, con una obra de arte realizada en conchas de mar que representa el bautismo de Jesucristo en el rio Jordán realizada por el fallecido señor Héctor propietario del hotel el Faro por orden del entonces párroco Gilberto León Franco; es una fuente compuesta por un circuito cerrado.
Encontramos una gruta que es un adorno de piedra utilizado en…

Las Playas de Arboletes son el mayor atractivo turístico para los visitantes, son playas limpias y seguras, iluminadas toda la noche. Dotadas de dos garitas para salvavidas. Es una maravillosa experiencia disfrutar de estas playas en compañía de la Familia, Amigos o la Pareja.
Las Playas de Arboletes son el mayor atractivo turístico para los visitantes…

Arboletes is a town and municipality in the subregion of Urabá in Antioquia Department, Colombia.
The municipality is bounded by the Caribbean Sea to the north, the department of Córdoba to the north and east, the municipality of San Pedro de Urabá to the south and west, and the municipalities of Turbo and Necoclí.
